attributes.action: Stop the changes in Probate charges.
attributes.additional_details:
The flat £215 fee will be replaced with a new system of tiered charges that would result in some paying as much as £20,000 for estates worth more than £2m. For estates worth between £500,000 and £1m the new fee will be £4,000, rising to £8,000 for those worth between £1m and £1.6m, and £12,000 for those valued at between £1.6m and £2m.
This is legalised theft from people that  are dealing with the loss of a loved one and is a stealth tax. It needs to be stopped.
attributes.background: The government is planning huge rises in the probate fees charged when an individual dies and leaves property to their relatives in a bid to raise an additional £250m a year.
